column2: Python daemon which runs HTTP API. This daemon executes face detection functions, interfaces with ``MongoDB`` and ``findface-nnapi`` and ``tarantool@FindFace`` daemons.
Daemon which enables interaction with the face descriptors index.Â
Daemon extracts a feature vector (based on neural network). Requires the packages with :ref:`models <models>` :program:`<findface-data>.deb`.
Database which stores faces metadata, galleries details, settings, etc.
Nginx web server used to receive images using WebDAV.
Local license server which interfaces with NtechLab Global License Server (for network licensing) or a USB dongle (for on-premise licensing) and passes a license to licensable components.
